Name: Gator Bite
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime or orange juice & salt rim.
Review: Looks like a Margarita , but instead of tequila, it features the unique taste of Chartreuse. Yup, it bites.
Nutrition: One serving of Gator Bite contains 212 calories
